From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Review of Slime and Thief - In my 'easy' scenario of 16 faeries, I had 
trouble using the small slime to take them out.  In fact, I never got 
around to it because the potions of speed ran out BEFORE I killed all 
the faeries and I didn't have a prayer of taking out those faeries 
anytime soon.

About that thief - The thief had no trouble.  Aside from my opinion 
that if I wanted to kill my character, I should choose one where I 
have a chance of escaping the explosion [reference to Archer], 
some things have changed.I can remain cloaked the whole time and take 
out a small army.  Anchoring a poison cloud to a castle entrance and 
then taunting the enemy equals easy victory.  The Mega-Thief (like all 
other mega characters except Archmage) couldn't take out my 
slime-gods.  A thief is a suicidal character.

That brings me to a point:  entrances to castles should be wide enough 
that a thief can't anchor a couple of poison clouds to the sides and 
taunt and take out all the opponents.
